# third_party/
External assets and libraries not authored in this repo.

## Subfolders
- `vosk/` — STT models
- `piper/` — Piper binary and voice models

## Policy
- Prefer MIT/BSD/Apache; include LICENSE files when distributing.
- Large binaries/models should be ignored or managed via LFS.
- Document the exact upstream commit/version in a `VERSION.txt`.
